abstract: The accord would end a three-and-a-half-month walkout in Joliet, Ill., but local union leaders called for its rejection.
snippet: The accord would end a three-and-a-half-month walkout in Joliet, Ill., but local union leaders called for its rejection.
lead_paragraph: Caterpillar and the International Association of Machinists said on Wednesday that they had reached a tentative six-year settlement that could end a 15-week strike at the company’s hydraulics parts plant in Joliet, Ill.

headline.main: Ratification of Union’s Deal With Caterpillar May Face Difficulties
headline.print_headline: Tentative Pact Reached In Strike at Caterpillar
